summary:
Need a home near Riften, but don\'t like to go into the city to the home?
Try out this home then!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s16.postimg.org/u3smu9ixh/mkarchitatz.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://s13.postimg.org/iabwcnhvb/Mkar.png[/img][/center]
[size=2][center]Hey hey!
[color=lightslategrey]The[/color][color=lightskyblue]Lord[/color][color=lightsteelblue]Tesla[/color] here with a home, a nice Riften based Dwemer manor, placed a stones throw away from Snow Shod Farm, which is near Riften.[/center][/size]

[size=6][color=darkgoldenrod][center]~Update~[/center][/color][/size]
[center]This mod is now in the v0.2 stage! It is a lot less buggy, and a lot more house like. It has came out of the baby stages and is now into full development, and will eventually be a bug free, fully busy home for every Skyrim player to enjoy.[/center] 

[size=6][color=darkgoldenrod][center]~Description~[/center][/color][/size]
[center]The house itself is featured in a valley, separate from the [color=darkgoldenrod]Riften[/color] world. The house\'s interior has a kitchen, and blacksmith\'s room, and an alchemy/enchantment room (the two are merged in one room), and a player room with completely safe storage, which consists of several safes, chests, a reading area with books and chairs, two double beds. The house has now been tweaked a little, to make for better living. I removed the random [color=darkgoldenrod]Deekus[/color] standing in the main hall; he was only there to test some random [color=darkgoldenrod]navmeshing[/color]. I made the house-carls and added cook a lot prettier in my opinion. I also added [color=darkgoldenrod]Works-With-Steel[/color], an argonian smith; [color=darkgoldenrod]Myiatar[/color], a Khajiit smith; a brute [color=darkgoldenrod]Nord[/color], [color=darkgoldenrod]Tytus Morndai[/color]; [color=darkgoldenrod]Skjon[/color]\'s husband, [color=darkgoldenrod]Rickta[/color]; a demon-man [color=darkgoldenrod]Dark Elf[/color], [color=darkgoldenrod]Marstrys Demon-Rend[/color]; [color=darkgoldenrod]Almacyn[/color], a [color=darkgoldenrod]Dark Elf[/color] assassin; [color=darkgoldenrod]Niacron Force-Fane,[/color] a [color=darkgoldenrod]Wood Elf[/color] in [color=darkgoldenrod]Greybeard[/color] robes; Also staying are [color=darkgoldenrod]Skjon[/color] and [color=darkgoldenrod]Almirel[/color], your favorite house-carl\'s. All of their AI is now set to a convenient option called \"sandbox\". This makes them choose from a myriad of random things to do. With that on hand, I added a ton, and I mean a ton of idle markers for the NPC\'s to choose from. I felt the main dining hall to be a bit bare, so I put a meal for each seat on the table now. I made the blacksmith\'s room more appropriate to a blacksmith. I took out some tanning racks and in their place, is now grindstones and workbenches. Also in the blacksmith room is now less invisible chest\'s and more rearranged loot, but there is still a lot of smiting ingredients on there. Future builds will remove some of the 20 safes in the room. [/center]

[size=6][color=darkgoldenrod][center]~Required Files!~[/center][/color][/size]
[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]Skyrim 1.9.32[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]Dawnguard![/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]Dragonborn![/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M[/size][/color][/center]
[center]This mod is not necessary yet, but I will implement it soon. You can go ahead and get this mod anyhow. Find that here, try to get all of the versions for Skyrim, Dragonborn, and Dawnguard. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004//?[/center]

[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]UNP Clothing Merchants[/size][/color][/center]
[center]You will want this to have the house contain some free versions of the armor, or just to have [color=darkgoldenrod]Haafingar Hall[/color] in the first place, I really love this shop. Find it here, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684//?[/center]

[center][color=darkgrey][size=4]Apachii Sky Hair[/size][/color][/center]
[center]You need this or you will get a mad CTD flying at you. This, not integrated yet, but somehow, still necessary.
Find it here, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//? and get ApachiiHair.esm (It is neccesary!) but you can use any hair mod Apachii made.

[/center][size=4][color=darkgoldenrod][center]~Recommended~[/center][/color][/size]
[center]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
     :Use the bodyslide option in this installation to get the most \"[i]endowment[/i]\" out of your armor and clothes for the NPC\'s for current and future builds.[/center]

As far as I am concerned, that is all, ciao!
[u][size=0.5]But seriously, PM me for bugs and weird stuff, or requests and ideas, or to help out the Tesla cause![/size][/u]
author: TheLordTelsa
